headline.print_headline: Kerber Overcomes Blip to Beat Local Hope Gajdosova
headline.main: Kerber Overcomes Blip to Beat Local Hope Gajdosova

docs.snippet: Ninth-seed Angelique Kerber shook off a second-set blip to advance to the second round of the Australian Open on Monday with a 6-3 0-6 6-2 win over local wildcard Jarmila Gajdosova....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ninth-seed Angelique Kerber shook off a second-set blip to advance to the second round of the Australian Open on Monday with a 6-3 0-6 6-2 win over local wildcard Jarmila Gajdosova.

headline.print_headline: Date-Krumm Loses to Teenager at Australian Open
headline.main: Date-Krumm Loses to Teenager at Australian Open

docs.snippet: Kimiko Date-Krumm is used to questions about retirement but still has no answer. For now, she's content to continue the "miracle" of playing professional tennis at age 43....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kimiko Date-Krumm is used to questions about retirement but still has no answer. For now, she's content to continue the "miracle" of playing professional tennis at age 43.

docs.snippet: Mike Fisher, an archaeologist from the University of Chicago, is working with a team that is cataloging, classifying and restoring the National Museum of Afghanistan’s collection of artifacts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Fisher, an archaeologist from the University of Chicago, is working with a team that is cataloging, classifying and restoring the National Museum of Afghanistan’s collection of artifacts.

headline.print_headline: Asian Shares Mostly Firmer, Gold Hits One-Month High
headline.main: Asian Shares Mostly Firmer, Gold Hits One-Month High

docs.snippet: Asian shares and currencies were mostly firmer on Monday in the wake of surprisingly weak U.S. jobs numbers that revived speculation the Federal Reserve could keep policy loose for longer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Asian shares and currencies were mostly firmer on Monday in the wake of surprisingly weak U.S. jobs numbers that revived speculation the Federal Reserve could keep policy loose for longer.

headline.print_headline: Broncos Survive Chargers Rally to Reach AFC Championship Game
headline.main: Broncos Survive Chargers Rally to Reach AFC Championship Game

docs.snippet: The Denver Broncos survived a fourth-quarter fightback by the San Diego Chargers to claim a 24-17 win on Sunday and advance to the AFC Championship game for the first time in eight years....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos survived a fourth-quarter fightback by the San Diego Chargers to claim a 24-17 win on Sunday and advance to the AFC Championship game for the first time in eight years.

headline.print_headline: Israel Boosts Security for Sharon Funeral Near Gaza Border
headline.main: Israel Boosts Security for Sharon Funeral Near Gaza Border

docs.snippet: Israel beefed up security for former Prime Minister Ariel Sharon's funeral near the Gaza border on Monday and warned the enclave's Palestinian rulers not to allow rocket fire during the ceremony, which U.S. Vice President Joe Biden planned to atte...
docs.lead_paragraph: Israel beefed up security for former Prime Minister Ariel Sharon's funeral near the Gaza border on Monday and warned the enclave's Palestinian rulers not to allow rocket fire during the ceremony, which U.S. Vice President Joe Biden planned to attend.

headline.print_headline: UK to Make Debt Pledge Ahead of Scotland Referendum: Source
headline.main: UK to Make Debt Pledge Ahead of Scotland Referendum: Source

docs.snippet: The British government will announce on Monday that it will take responsibility for all British government debt should Scotland vote to leave the United Kingdom this year, a person familiar with the situation said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The British government will announce on Monday that it will take responsibility for all British government debt should Scotland vote to leave the United Kingdom this year, a person familiar with the situation said on Sunday.
